settings.title: Description
settings.answer:
It is here, in this intimate enclave of creativity and camaraderie, that like-minded souls gather—writers, artists, dreamers, and visionaries. A private members' club where trends are born not through noise, but through whispered conversations. The lighting is low, a golden haze softening edges, shadows cast like secrets. Leather-bound books line the walls, and the air carries the scent of polished wood and quiet power.

The fragrance arrives – bold yet refined – a tribute to free spirits who move against the current. Anchored by Bourbon vanilla, the scent begins with a raw, golden sweetness, unexpected, alive, deepening into darker layers of smoke and spice. A rich, rebellious twist on a timeless note.

Bold, modern, and untamed, it mirrors the room’s energy, creative minds daring to break the rules.

In this suspended moment, a chapter of inspiration unfolds, ephemeral yet boundless. The fragrance, like those who wear it, is a declaration: daring, creative, and unapologetically free.

settings.title: Shipping & Return
settings.answer: Orders within the UAE will be delivered in approximately 1-2 business days, while international orders may take around 10-14 business days to arrive.

settings.title: Additional Info
settings.answer:
Notes:

T: Cardamom, Cinnamon, Orange Blossom, Bergamot

H: Vanilla, Elemi

B: Musk, Tonka, Praline, Almond

settings.title: Free shipping
settings.content: Free worldwide shipping and returns - customs and duties taxes included

settings.title: Customer service
settings.content: We are available from monday to friday to answer your questions.

settings.title: Contact us
settings.content: Need to contact us? Just send us an e-mail at sales@amaya-international.com.

settings.title: ABOUT THE PRODUCT
settings.content:
The First Spark
Saffron & Black Pepper. Bold. Magnetic. Unapologetic.
———————————————
The Slow Burn
Dark Oud smolders. Leather deepens. Tension rises.
———————————————
The Afterglow
Amber & Tonka. Warm, lingering, undeniable.
———————————————
No Limits. No Hesitation. No Regrets.
A scent for those who let desire lead.
———————————————
A Glance, A Promise, A Fire.
For the ones who leave an unforgettable trace.
———————————————
More Than a Scent. It’s a Seduction.
Dare to get closer.

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.

settings.title: Rule-Breaking Perfumes
settings.content: Designed for those who refuse the ordinary.

settings.title: Evolves With You
settings.content: Layers of scent revealing new sides of you.

settings.title: More Than a Scent
settings.content: A bold statement of freedom and self-discovery.
